name: Apricot and Averna Bourbon Sour
description: This bourbon sour has a nice bitter bite from the Averna to balance the sweetness of the apricot liqueur.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces bourbon, such as Four Roses Yellow Label

recipeInstructions.text: Add bourbon, apricot liqueur, Averna, and lemon juice to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled OId Fashioned glass, garnish with lemon twist, and serve immediately.
